- [ ] **`fail_to_start`**
  - Status: ❌ Failed with compilation error  
  - Compilation Comment: 🟢 Yes
  - Results Review: 🔴 No

  - Status: ✅ Passed, with violations found  
  - Compilation Comment: 🔴 No
  - Results Review: 🟢 Yes  

- [ ] **`verified_rules`**
  - Status: ✅ Passed without violations

  - Results Review: 🟢 Yes
